message.entry: Unable to obtain information for file ''{0}'': {1}.

Usage: hMapfile(memstruct) where memstruct has fields: dataHandle, filename, writable: true/false, numElements, format: 'u/int8/logical'
		 | 'u/int16/char'
		 | 'u/int32'
		 | 'u/int64'
		 | 'single'
		 | 'double',
		 [optional: offset].
The total number of bytes mapped may not exceed {0}\n(including padding from Offset to the next lowest page boundary).
